thread.title: Cookie Just Pulled a Beyoncé and Lemonade-d the Hell Out of Empire
thread.title_full: Cookie Just Pulled a Beyoncé and Lemonade-d the Hell Out of Empire

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Cookie Just Pulled a Beyoncé and Lemonade-d the Hell Out of Empire
text:
Cookie's Lemonade Moment on Empire Cookie Just Pulled a Beyoncé and Lemonade-d the Hell Out of Empire March 23, 2017 109 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Empire sure knows how to make an impression. After being gone since December, the soapy series returned for the second half of season three on Wednesday. The episode has the requisite amount of twists, turns, and power plays, but the money shot comes at the end when Lucious betrays Cookie and she goes full-on Lemonade on his office. She takes a baseball bat to all of his prized possessions, all the while screaming at him. Ah, Cookie, an inspiration to us all . Check out the moment above, and enjoy this badass picture.
